duties_responsibilities.duty: Discuss project scope and functional specifications with Project Manager, and design logic system using computer-assisted engineering software.
Design arrangements of conductors, relays, PLC's, and other components using computer-assisted engineering software.
Develop Bill of Materials for the project scope and confer with Assembly Team to resolve control system problems.
Design controls for optimizing operator interface and resolve control issues.
Review schematics and control configurations with customer's representatives and observe operation during trial run of programmed equipment.
Follow ISO 9001 Quality Procedures and Work Instructions, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Technical certificates or Associate/Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field (preferred)
